p: The likely multiple origins of viruses, followed by extended events of interaction with evolving host organisms of all phyla have produced myriad viral particles that at the present time outnumber cells by a factor of 10 (Chapter 1). The way to put order into such diversity is to classify viruses as done periodically by the International Committee on Taxonomy of Viruses (ICTV) ( http://www.ictvonline.org/).
